title: SurfaceMetrics
description: Outputs information about a surface's mesh

volume.title: Volume
volume.description: Calculates the volume of a surface.

convexity.title: Convexity
convexity.description: Output surface convexity at each node.

closest_node.title: Closest Node
closest_node.description: Find the closest node to each XYZ triplet in XYZ_LIST.1D.

tri_sines.title: Triangle Sines
tri_sines.description: Output sine of angles at nodes forming triangles.

tri_cosines.title: Triangle Cosines
tri_cosines.description: Output cosine of angles at nodes forming triangles.

tri_CoSines.title: Triangle Cosines and Sines
tri_CoSines.description: Output both cosines and sines of angles at nodes forming triangles.

tri_angles.title: Triangle Angles
tri_angles.description: Unsigned angles in radians of triangles.

node_angles.title: Node Angles
node_angles.description: Unsigned angles in radians at nodes of surface.

normals_scale.title: Normals Scale
normals_scale.description: Scale the normals by a given factor.

coords.title: Coordinates
coords.description: Output coordinates of each node after any transformation.

sph_coords.title: Spherical Coordinates
sph_coords.description: Output spherical coordinates of each node.

sph_coords_center.title: Spherical Coordinates Center
sph_coords_center.description: Shift each node by x y z before calculating spherical coordinates.

boundary_nodes.title: Boundary Nodes
boundary_nodes.description: Output nodes that form a boundary of a surface.

boundary_triangles.title: Boundary Triangles
boundary_triangles.description: Output triangles that form a boundary of a surface.

internal_nodes.title: Internal Nodes
internal_nodes.description: Output nodes that are not a boundary.
